title: Hurrah! Hurrah!
author: JGray
text:
And so, this week we introduce the viquirrels.

Part viking.

Part squirrel.

All ripped.

I mean, look at the abs on those dudes!

See you Monday!

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: I wasn't sure if they were 'Roided males or Ripped females. I mean those pecs!

replies.author: Vombatidae*Guest*
replies.text: I had the same reaction. Your art is very good, and often great, but occasionally uneven; so I was sure how to interpret this. If you were going for creepy, ripped androgynous viquirrels, you NAILED it. Otherwise the chest/waist/hip ratios and stance are giving off a very feminine vibe while the torso is very masculine.

replies.author: TheDerangedOne*Guest*
replies.text: So... Has Chrys not been told about the obvious reasons of why you don't go rushing through a live fire modern-esk battlefield yet or something? I mean, it's sorta just common sense to why that is.
